description: Allow VoIP Phones to SIP Server
nl_query: Allow VoIP_Phones to access SIP_Server on SIP_UDP and RTP

metadata.raw_policy: Allow VoIP_Phones to access SIP_Server on SIP_UDP and RTP

expected_cli:
set rulebase security rules r1 from Voice
set rulebase security rules r1 to Datacenter
set rulebase security rules r1 source VoIP_Phones
set rulebase security rules r1 destination SIP_Server
set rulebase security rules r1 service udp_5060
set rulebase security rules r1 action allow

set rulebase security rules r2 from Voice
set rulebase security rules r2 to Datacenter
set rulebase security rules r2 source VoIP_Phones
set rulebase security rules r2 destination SIP_Server
set rulebase security rules r2 service udp_10000
set rulebase security rules r2 action allow

description: Allow Video Conference Room to Zoom Ranges
nl_query: Allow Video_Conf_Room to access Zoom_Ranges on HTTPS

metadata.raw_policy: Allow Video_Conf_Room to access Zoom_Ranges on HTTPS

expected_cli:
set rulebase security rules r1 from Video
set rulebase security rules r1 to Outside
set rulebase security rules r1 source Video_Conf_Room
set rulebase security rules r1 destination Zoom_Ranges
set rulebase security rules r1 service application-default
set rulebase security rules r1 action allow
